Description.SourceString: All characters have an elemental affinity - Dark, Fire, Light, Nature, or Water. Every elemental type is dominant against one element and susceptible to another.  Attacking with the correct (dominant) element will deal 50% extra damage, and attacking with the wrong (susceptible) element will deal half damage.
Description.LocalizedString: All characters have an elemental affinity - Dark, Fire, Light, Nature, or Water. Every elemental type is dominant against one element and susceptible to another.  Attacking with the correct (dominant) element will deal 50% extra damage, and attacking with the wrong (susceptible) element will deal half damage.
